subject: Re: [junit] Horizontal scroll errors in swingui ?
msgSnippet: ... Same problem here. In practice, the bottom pane always has the information you need. First click on the failure from the top pane, then look at the details
messageBody:
--- Gael Marziou <gael_marziou@...> wrote:
>In JUnit 3.4 swingui runner, I did not find a way to scroll
>horizontally the errors, the only way I have to see the end of line

Same problem here. In practice, the bottom pane always has the
information you need. First click on the failure from the top pane,
then look at the details in the bottom pane (which does horizontally
scroll).

Regards,

Rob
